title: Abdul Sattar
text:
Data enthusiast with a passion for transforming raw data into actionable insights. Proficient in SQL, R, and data visualization tools like Tableau and Power BI, I thrive on uncovering patterns and trends to drive informed decision-making. A collaborative team player with good communication skills, I’m eager to contribute to data-driven initiatives that make a real impact.

When I’m not exploring data, you can find me indulging in my hobbies of sketching, playing tennis, and reading books.
